title: 90% of people who don't do placements don't do them because they suck.
body:
I know this sounds like a generalization, and trust me, not all unranked players are like this.

But a good majority suck at this game and don't want other people to know it, so they use the excuse "I don't want to participate in Riot's broken ranked system", even when the system is not that bad.
